seqinfos

Source: R/data.R
seqinfos.Rd

Chrom sizes fom different genomes

data(seqinfos)

Format

An object of class "Seqinfo".

Examples

data(seqinfos)
seqinfos
#> $sacCer3
#> GRanges object with 17 ranges and 0 metadata columns:
#>        seqnames    ranges strand
#>           <Rle> <IRanges>  <Rle>
#>    [1]     chrI  1-230218      *

#>    [3]   chrIII  1-316620      *

#>    [5]     chrV  1-576874      *
#>    ...      ...       ...    ...
#>   [13]  chrXIII  1-924431      *
#>   [14]   chrXIV  1-784333      *
#>   [15]    chrXV 1-1091291      *
#>   [16]   chrXVI  1-948066      *
#>   [17]     chrM   1-85779      *

#>   seqinfo: 17 sequences from an unspecified genome; no seqlengths
